import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../stylesheets/UX.scss"; import mu from "../images/ux/portada-mu.png"; import mugif from "../images/ux/mu-unscreen.gif"; import asos from "../images/ux/portada-asos.png"; import waggin from "../images/ux/portada-waggin.png"; import waggingif from "../images/ux/waggin-unscreen.gif"; import React, { useState } from "react"; const UX = () => { const [top, setTop] = useState(""); const [middle, setMiddle] = useState(""); const [bottom, setBottom] = useState(""); const [collapsable, setCollapsable] = useState(""); const handleChange = () => { !top ? setTop("top") : setTop(""); !bottom ? setBottom("bottom") : setBottom(""); !middle ? setMiddle("middle") : setMiddle(""); !collapsable ? setCollapsable("close") : setCollapsable(""); }; return (
Landing UX / UI Front - end About me

); }; export default UX;
